Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am excited to present our premium product, which I believe is perfectly aligned with your needs and expectations. This exceptional item is valued at $12,000 by its current owner, but I am offering it to you at a special introductory price of $11,500. This exclusive opportunity allows you to acquire a high-quality asset at a reduced cost, ensuring significant value for your investment. Don't miss out on this chance to enhance your collection or operations with an item that meets your specific requirements. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the possibility of working with you. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $11,500. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $11,500
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $12,000
